note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: The ASF+SDF Meta-Environment is an inter-active IDE for language prototyping, source code analysis and source-to-source transformation. It contains the implementation of SDF2 and ASF+SDF.
name: ASF+SDF Meta-Environment
body:
### Welcome

We're testing the pages feature of Github, to see if we can migrate http://www.meta-environment.org to here.
